title: Anyone else having problems with the "hey Google take a selfie" since getting Android 10 update?
content: I received another Android 10 update last week and the "hey Google take a selfie" feature worked for a day. Ever since I got the Android 10 update it's been doing this. I don't understand why. Instead of counting down to take the selfie it sends me to my camera app logo.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
